PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07112019-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of BARRY M. RIVELIS of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Royal Canadian Mint, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective July 1, 2019, in the place of William C. Ross, whose term willl expire.
AttachmentsAttachment
